item.description: So you’ve configured BitLocker silent encryption in Microsoft Intune, but some of your devices are failing to encrypt complaining about a DMA exception issue. How can we fix that without creating a gaping security hole?

item.title: Enabling BitLocker and WinRE on failed Windows Devices
item.description: You may have enabled and configure BitLocker for silent encryption on your Windows 10 Autopilot joined devices, but have you had the headache of devices that don’t have a Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) configured? Yep? Me too…
